content.query:
-- =============================================================================
-- European Soccer Events
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'GameEvents' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE [Spark].[GameEvents]
GO

CREATE TABLE [Spark].[GameEvents]
( 
	[id_odsp] [nvarchar](32)  NULL,
	[id_event] [nvarchar](32)  NULL,
	[sort_order] [int]  NULL,
	[time] [int]  NULL,
	[event_type] [int]  NULL,
	[event_type_str] [nvarchar](32)  NULL,
	[event_type2] [int]  NULL,
	[event_type2_str] [nvarchar](32)  NULL,
	[side] [int]  NULL,
	[side_str] [nvarchar](16)  NULL,
	[event_team] [nvarchar](128)  NULL,
	[opponent] [nvarchar](128)  NULL,
	[player] [nvarchar](128)  NULL,
	[player2] [nvarchar](128)  NULL,
	[player_in] [nvarchar](128)  NULL,
	[player_out] [nvarchar](128)  NULL,
	[shot_place] [int]  NULL,
	[shot_place_str] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[shot_outcome] [int]  NULL,
	[shot_outcome_str] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[is_goal] [int]  NULL,
	[location] [int]  NULL,
	[location_str] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[bodypart] [int]  NULL,
	[bodypart_str] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[assist_method] [int]  NULL,
	[assist_method_str] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[situation] [int]  NULL,
	[situation_str] [nvarchar](64)  NULL,
	[country_code] [nchar](3)  NULL,
	[time_bin] [float]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
)
GO
CREATE INDEX IX_GameEvents_isgoal_country ON DataFlow.factGameEvents(is_goal, country);
GO
